Estudio, based on the telenovela of the same title. The comic was first published April 2006 and lasted only two issues due to conflicts caused by Ka-Boom's writers. Despite initial demand being high, the amateur writing team from Ka-Boom delivered the scripts for the first three issues months later than agreed, causing the art team trouble and also creating conflicts with Televisa's editorial representatives, which led to the cancellation of the title.\n\nThe series was advertised as being based on the style of Japanese manga, but it was only partially based on it."},"links":{"raw":"https://www.rbdfotos.org/index.php?/category/2434"},"originalLanguage":"es-la","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Enzo, por outro lado, é mais reservado, equilibrando os estudos com a expectativa da sua mãe e o medo de nunca realizar seu sonho de ser quadrinista. Quando seus caminhos se cruzam, o interesse é imediato, mas transformar isso em um relacionamento é outra história.\n\nEntre desencontros, julgamentos alheios e os desafios de conciliar vida acadêmica, família e sentimentos inesperados, 365 Dias Apaixonados acompanha um ano repleto de paixão, dúvidas e aprendizados. Afinal, estar junto não é só sobre gostar - é sobre enfrentar o mundo lado a lado."},"links":{"raw":"https://www.wattpad.com/story/391663688-365-dias-apaixonados"},"originalLanguage":"pt-br","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"891cf039-b895-47f0-9229-bef4c96eccd4","name":{"en":"Self-Published"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

35ade886-9dde-4179-a9a5-409fe8fb5117:::||@!@||:::2025-03-31T01:55:27:::||@!@||:::{"id":"35ade886-9dde-4179-a9a5-409fe8fb5117","title":{"en":"Mysteries of the Looking Glass"},"altTitles":[{"es":"Misterios del Espejo"},{"ru":"Тайны Зазеркалья"}],"description":{"en":"When the truth is hidden beyond the looking glass… will you see your own reflection in it?\n\nIn the modern world, magic exists — but is hidden from sight. Monsters, spells, ancient curses — all of it hides just beyond the thin boundary of mirrors, a boundary few can see.\n\nSoba Akage is a trainee in an elite magical unit that investigates the most complex and bizarre cases no one else can solve. Aizek Sato is an ordinary student who accidentally witnesses a magical murder. Teo Quasar is a brilliant but insufferable detective who trusts no one but himself.\n\nTogether, they’ll face mysteries where every case is like a shard of a shattered mirror: reflecting not only the crime but themselves. The deeper they dive into the magical world, the thinner the line between truth and illusion becomes.","es":"Cuando la verdad se oculta al otro lado del espejo… ¿verás tu propio reflejo en él?\n\nEn el mundo moderno, la magia existe — pero oculta a simple vista. Monstruos, hechizos, maldiciones antiguas — todo eso se esconde justo detrás del fino límite de los espejos, un límite que pocos pueden ver.\n\nSoba Akage es una aprendiz en una unidad mágica de élite que investiga los casos más complejos y extraños que nadie más puede resolver. Aizek Sato es un estudiante común que, por accidente, presencia un asesinato mágico. Teo Quasar es un detective brillante, pero insoportable, que no confía en nadie más que en sí mismo.\n\nJuntos deberán resolver misterios donde cada caso es como un fragmento de un espejo roto: refleja no solo el crimen, sino también a ellos mismos. Cuanto más se adentren en el mundo mágico, más delgada será la línea entre la verdad y la ilusión.","ru":"Когда правда спрятана по ту сторону зеркала, увидешь ли ты в нем свое отражение?\n\nВ современном мире магия существует — но скрыта от глаз. Монстры, заклинания, древние проклятия — всё это прячется прямо за тонкой гранью зеркал - за гранью, которую мало кто может увидеть.\n\nСоба Акаге — стажёр в элитном магическом отделе, где расследуют самые сложные и странные преступления, с которыми не справляются другие. Айзек Сато — обычный студент, случайно оказавшийся свидетелем магического убийства. Тео Квазар — гениальный, но абсолютно несносный детектив, который не верит ни в кого, кроме себя.\n\nВместе им предстоит распутывать загадки, где каждое дело — как осколок разбитого зеркала: отражает не только преступление, но и самих героев. Чем глубже они проникают в магический мир, тем тоньше становится грань между правдой и иллюзией."},"originalLanguage":"en","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"891cf039-b895-47f0-9229-bef4c96eccd4","name":{"en":"Self-Published"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

cd0aa262-9ee6-4ad5-adc3-9196f1c4c1a7:::||@!@||:::2025-03-31T01:55:27:::||@!@||:::{"id":"cd0aa262-9ee6-4ad5-adc3-9196f1c4c1a7","title":{"en":"Minami the Super Evolution"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ミナミザスーパーエボリューション"},{"ja-ro":"Minamiza the Super Evolution"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Minami is a high school girl who feels totally average. She's tired of blending into the background and thinks her life is boring. Daydreaming about excitement and maybe a trip to New York, she gets inspired by her favorite anime. \n\nShe tries to show off a dramatic special move to her friend Nakamura and it completely fails. Minami swears she actually did have powers yesterday, breaking a mug with the move. Nakamura isn't buying it. And after listening in on a few too many phone calls, a plant has sprouted from her ear. Now with her parents no longer wanting to pay for her bachelorette lifestyle, Juliet is being evicted from her apartment. But on her last night in the big city, a dragon lands. The dragon, Feria, knows all about Juliet’s curse. Feria is on a quest and Juliet’s snooping has now tangled her in it. Without a life to return to, Juliet agrees to join the dragon and help her however she can. Com suas maneiras imprevisíveis e emocionantes de liberar o estresse, a mente de Makoto está constantemente em turbulência!\n\nUma comédia ousada e destemida sobre uma veterana que está muito reprimida!"},"links":{"al":"186437","ap":"chiriko-senpai-wa-tamatteiru","kt":"chiriko-senpai-wa-tamatteiru","mal":"180276","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_006347_S/episodes/KC_0063470000200011_E?episodeType=first"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

By unlocking his status window, he could freely acquire skills, obtain item drops, and grow stronger without limit.","ja":"外れスキルが実は超チート!?15歳になると天よりスキルを授かる世界。俺、ヒラク・マトーは、剣聖の一族に生まれた。幼いころから神童と呼ばれ、きっと俺も剣聖になるものだと周りから期待されていた。ところがスキル鑑定の儀式で授けられたのは【開】というスキル。『閉じたものを開く』だけの外れスキルだと、周りから失望され実家から追放される。途方にくれる俺は偶然、このスキルの真の力に気づく。「ステータスウィンドウ」を開き、スキルやドロップアイテムを自由に取得し無双する異世界チートスキルファンタジー！"},"links":{"al":"189861","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DYL7LYPJ","ap":"ore-dake-status-open-dekiru-ken-ore-dake-status-kakunin-dekiru-sekai-de-cheat-skill-mo-s-kyuu-item-mo-erabihoudai","bw":"series/514850","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/889215","mal":"180149","mu":"ijrya9l","raw":"https://www.manga-up.com/titles/1404"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

But for the one who fell, it was the moment of death. Leaving behind a life in another world.\n\nKnown only as Midnight to the masses, for ten long years, the Hero watches over the city. London’s underbelly teems with ancient secrets, where the transgressions of the past are entwined in the very foundations of the earth. 5e1cc2ea-7d3d-44a3-b070-02ceb9ddb180:::||@!@||:::2025-03-31T01:55:34:::||@!@||:::{"id":"5e1cc2ea-7d3d-44a3-b070-02ceb9ddb180","title":{"en":"Changing the Genre From Angst to Heartwarming"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"피폐물을 힐링물로 만드는 방법"},{"ko-ro":"Pipyemureul Healingmullo Mandeuneun Bangbeop"},{"en":"How to Change a Tragedy Novel Into a Healing One"},{"en":"How to Change Angst Into a Feel-Good"},{"en":"Changing Waste to Healing"},{"fr":"Je vais changer cette tragédie"},{"th":"เปลี่ยนบทร้ายให้เป็นบทรัก"},{"ja":"転生したので闇落ち野獣を手懐けます"},{"zh":"暗黑变治愈的改写方法"},{"zh":"把颓废文变为治愈文的办法"},{"zh-hk":"治癒暗黑系男主的方法"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"I got reincarnated! Into the prettiest, kindest, daintiest, most perfect female lead…’s little sister. The problem is that this story is an angsty R19 story. The male lead is an insane bastard with a streak of madness and my sister is doomed to be a mental wreck due to his obsession, facing a tragic ending where she loses her mind. I absolutely cannot let my beautiful and kind older sister meet such a miserable fate! From now on, I’m in charge of the genre—from an angst to a feel-good story! I’ll be fine. I’m not Astella. I’m not as pretty as her so the male lead would never fall for me.\n\n“Cute.” That isn’t the word that should be coming from the cruel and cold-blooded male lead’s mouth… I’ll be fine, right? I don’t have Astella’s delicate wrist nor her small waist that could be encircled in one arm. Not to mention, her fair skin. Him falling for me would be out of the question.\n\n“You can’t escape. There’s no place for you to escape.”\n\n…Surely I’d be fine? Our first encounter wasn’t as passionate as it should’ve been in the story. Plus, the male lead wasn’t as insane as he was described to be. …So, I should be fine, right…?\n\n“How should I explain this urge to strangle the bastard who touched you?”\n\nI don’t think I’m fine!\n\n---\nI've been reincarnated. Into a novel I used to enjoy in my past life, no less! My name is Renatis, and I'll be playing the part of little sister to the female lead in this dark, tragic whirlwind of a story where a beastly bad boy shatters my sister's hopes, dreams, and her life. My sister is too good and too beautiful, and I'm not about to let that happen to my perfect sister. So, I'm taking charge. I shall turn this dark, tragic story into a heartwarming tale of healing. I will save my sister.","fr":"Renatis devient la petite sœur de la belle et gentille héroïne du roman qu'elle lisait. Trop cliché? Bien sûr que non! Parce que c'est un roman pour adultes! Pour protéger sa sœur, elle se fait capturer à sa place par le beau héros fou et obsessionnel, Theodore. Il est temps de dompter le personnage masculin principal!","id":"“Aku reinkarnasi jadi tokoh novel favoritku!” Hmm, terdengar membosankan ya...? Akhirnya dia menggantikan kakak perempuannya untuk ditangkap Theodor, tokoh utama pria yang tampan namun gila. Tapi si tokoh utama pria itu... lebih ‘buas’ dari yang kubayangkan! b2320d0c-5da2-4040-855f-132efcac1a29:::||@!@||:::2025-03-31T01:55:34:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b2320d0c-5da2-4040-855f-132efcac1a29","title":{"en":"Kitai no Akujo, Sandome no Jinsei de \"Musai Munou\" wo Tanoshimu"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"稀代の悪女、三度目の人生で【無才無能】を楽しむ"},{"ja-ro":"Kitai no Akujo, Sandome no Jinsei de \"Musai Munou\" o Tanoshimu"},{"en":"I Enjoy being Talentless"},{"en":"A Notorious Villainess Enjoying a Life of \"Talentlessness and Incompetence\" in Her Third Life"}],"description":{"en":"In her first life, she was a legendary villainess known for being utterly talentless. In her second life, she lived as an ordinary Japanese woman until the age of 86. And now, in her third life, she has been reborn as a 16-year-old noblewoman—but with the wisdom of someone who has lived over a century! Instead of chasing power or influence, she chooses to embrace her lack of talent—ignoring the scorn of her family and her fiancé, who looks down on her. After all, she knows that hiding her true abilities might be far more entertaining—and useful—than anyone expects! Will she be able to live peacefully as planned, or will her hidden talents once again drag trouble her way?\n___\n**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816927863356796443), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0481hq/)","ja":"前々世は無才無能な稀代の悪女・ベルジャンヌ、前世は86歳で大往生した日本人。\n今世はその記憶を持ち、中身トータル100歳超えのおばあちゃんな16歳ラビアンジェとして、義妹をはじめとする身内や、婚約者から罵られようと、力を隠しあえて何かとお得な無才無能として生きる!\n\n---\n**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816927863356796443), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0481hq/)"},"links":{"al":"183573","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CZGD56LW","ap":"notorious-no-more-the-villainess-enjoys-feigning-incompetence","bw":"series/523991","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/903264","mal":"180287","mu":"mp235z5","nu":"a-notorious-villainess-enjoying-a-life-of-talentless-and-incompetence-in-her-third-life","raw":"https://www.ganganonline.com/title/2046"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

3104cc87-579f-4299-98b0-2769fb47bbcb:::||@!@||:::2025-03-31T01:55:36:::||@!@||:::{"id":"3104cc87-579f-4299-98b0-2769fb47bbcb","title":{"en":"Moto Seijo Heroine no Watashi, Zokuhen de wa Mob nano ni Zen Status (Koukando wo Fukumu) ga Kansuto Shiteirundesu ga"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"元聖女ヒロインの私、続編ではモブなのに全ステータス（好感度を含む）がカンストしているんですが"},{"en":"From a Heroine to Just a Side Character... but Why is Everyone Obsessed with Me?!"}],"description":{"en":"She had never known love, nor had she any experience in relationships. But when her friend suggested playing an otome game titled \"Teenage Years Between Swords and Magic,\" she decided to give it a try. The surprise? Instead of a romantic ending, she got the Great Friendship Ending!\n\nDetermined to experience love, she starts a second playthrough of the game. However, out of nowhere, she finds herself reincarnated inside the game as the Saintess and its main heroine! She embarks on adventures with her friends, saves the world, and once again achieves... the Great Friendship Ending. But this time, on the very same night, she is mysteriously killed and returns to her real world. Two years pass, during which she discovers that the game she once entered has received a sequel.
